name: Trophy Hunt: Evolution TV
description:
​Deadly big game animals run wild, hunt by day or night and in all conditions.

Take every weapon you can with you, load it into your jeep, motorbike, boat, horse or track your prey by foot.

Collect these Weapons: Handgun/Rifle/Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows)/Compound Bow/Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters.

Use your Tracking device or Map to locate:

Bear, Wolf, Fox, Badger, Bison, Squirrel, Mallard, Stag, Moose, Crocodile, Piranha, Water Snake, Beetle, Bee, Eagle and Wild Boar.

At night camp out by your log fire, if you have night Vision Goggles then perhaps night hunting can be both fun and dangerous.

Trophy Hunt: Evolution has High quality graphics and gameplay.
